note.p: This parameter can be used as an alternative to command and command_script_file. It contains scriptcode which will be transferred to the remote host as a file and will then be executed there. The script can access job and order parameters by environment variables. The names are in upper case and have "SCHEDULER_PARAM_" as a prefix. Order parameters with the same name overwrite task parameters.
The parameters command, command_script and command_script_file are optional by themself, but it is required to set one of the three.
